summary: The Department of Defense PFAS Discharge Prevention Act (S. 2472) mandates the Secretary of Defense to modify stormwater discharge permits for Department of Defense facilities. The modifications require quarterly monitoring of perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS) discharges and the implementation of best management practices or control technologies to reduce these discharges. A minimum of one percent of remediation funds for PFAS is to be used for these activities.
